LEVEL_BASE::ATOMIC_IMPL

LEVEL_BASE::ATOMIC_IMPL Namespace Reference


Functions

VOID OnSignal (VOID *ctxt)

Detailed Description

Low-level implementation of fundemental atomic memory operations for arm. Clients should not use this class directly, but should use ATOMIC instead.
